name: Hotel Verte, Warsaw, Autograph Collection
description: Situated just a few steps from the picturesque Royal Castle and Warsaw's Old Town, Hotel Verte Warsaw is distinguished by its historic, noble exteriors, modern royal approach to hospitality, and extraordinary garden enclave. A boutique hotel set within the historic walls of a restored baroque palace with a fascinating past boasts a remarkable facade and historical interiors. Empowered by over 250 years of history the hotel features 94 rooms and suites, renovated Rococo interiors enhanced with capriccio touches, and three courtyards offering spectacular views. A truly unique location allows the guests to immerse themselves in history and culture while enjoying royal treatment and all the comfortable amenities. Guests can also enjoy an exquisite dining experience savoring dishes crafted with regional ingredients, served in a refined way or have their breakfast inside Pawilon - a glass-walled space with stunning views of the meticulously restored palace and a scenic garden.Marriott

name: Hotel Sante
description: Hotel Sante features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Praga Pólnoc district of Warsaw. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation offers free shuttle service, room service and luggage storage for guests. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. At Hotel Sante the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and ironing service at the property. Warsaw Uprising Monument is 4.6 km from the accommodation, while Jewish Ghetto Memorial is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 14 km from Hotel Sante.

name: The Westin Warsaw
address: Al. Jana Pawla II 21, 00-854 Warsaw, Mazowieckie
description: The Westin Warsaw is conveniently located in the business center of Warsaw, just a few steps from the Palace of Culture and Science, Zlote Tarasy shopping mall, main railway station, and metro line. The contemporary architecture and earthy elements give the rooms and common areas a balanced, spacious atmosphere, reflecting the hotel’s focus on well-being and resilience. During the stay, you will experience a special retreat from the ordinary – a perfect combination of holistic functionality and enlivening surroundings of the city center. Those travelling at the weekend will benefit from free on-site parking. Feel Well at the #WestinWarsaw.Marriott

name: Four Points by Sheraton Warsaw Mokotow
description: Welcome to the first Four Points by Sheraton hotel in Poland. We are 4-star hotel conveniently located in the heart of business centre in Warsaw in close proximity to the Chopin International Airport. The well-known Galeria Mokotow shopping mall is just a short walk away from the hotel. Discover the most famous Warsaw attractions located minutes away drive from the hotel. Book your stay in one of our 190 comfortable and stylish rooms, featuring 55” flat-screen TV, free high-speed Wi-Fi and Four Points beds. Visit our restaurant to indulge in seasonal delicacies, pamper yourself with a fresh craft beer from the hotel bar and enjoy our well-equipped fitness centre. Take advantage of our 5 meeting rooms, including main conference room accommodating 250 guests. Have a memorable experience in Four Points by Sheraton Warsaw Mokotow, delivering sincere and personalized service.Marriott

name: Focus Hotel Premium Warszawa
description: Set in Warsaw, 4.8 km from Blue City, Focus Hotel Premium Warszawa offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the sauna, or enjoy city views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms also offer a kitchenette with a microwave and a minibar. At Focus Hotel Premium Warszawa all rooms have bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. At Focus Hotel Premium Warszawa you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Polish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Frideric Chopin's Monument is 5.3 km from the hotel, while Warsaw West Train Station is 5.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 3 km from Focus Hotel Premium Warszawa.

name: Super Apart Chelmska 9
description: No description found

name: Nobu Hotel Warsaw
description: Situated in Warsaw, less than 1 km from Warsaw Central Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Warsaw features accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel has a sauna and nightclub. At the hotel, rooms have a desk. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Popular points of interest near Nobu Hotel Warsaw include Złote Tarasy Shopping Centre, Ujazdowski Park and Palace of Culture and Science. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Renaissance Warsaw Airport Hotel
address: Ul Zwirki i Wigury 1, Warsaw, Mazowieckie
description: Perfectly situated amid celebrated attractions, Renaissance Warsaw Airport Hotel is a luxury haven for today's discerning traveler. Immerse yourself in 5-star comfort in beautifully designed accommodations with modern essentials, refined design elements, soundproof windows and premium amenities. Enjoy a coveted location within steps of Warsaw Chopin Airport near Old Town, Sródmiescie Business District, Parliament, the National Museum and National Stadium. Delight your palate with distinctive fine dining and hand-crafted cocktails at our signature restaurant. Host flawless meetings, weddings and social affairs in sophisticated event spaces, enhanced by expert planners, state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment and custom catering. Punctuate a memorable day of work or exploration with a restorative beauty of wellness treatment at our luxury hotel day spa. Whatever your reason for visiting, we look forward to providing you with an unforgettable stay at Renaissance Warsaw Airport Hotel.Marriott

name: Hotel Bristol, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Warsaw
description: Situated on the celebrated Royal Route, next to the Presidential Palace and just a short stroll from the Old Town, Royal Castle, National Theater and Opera House. Hotel Bristol has served as a city landmark and distinguished destination since 1901. A captivating union of history and modernity, the Art Nouveau masterpiece enchants with exceptional interiors. The iconic Café Bristol, Marconi Restaurant, two bars and the enchanting rooftop offer singular epicurean indulgence while our Bristol spa combines a scenic relaxation area, indoor pool, gym, sauna, and a steam room. Our luxury hotel rooms and suites blend classical style and modern finesse. Unrivaled stay experience with outstanding views, timeless decorations and unsurpassed comfort. The Paderewski Suite is an exquisite gem in Bristol’s crown, boasting pure beauty and luxury. Original antiques from the beginning of the 20th century recall the historic spirit of the place. Our 5-star hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee.Marriott

name: Courtyard by Marriott Warsaw Airport
address: 1J Zwirki i Wigury Street, 00-906 Warsaw, Mazowieckie
description: Encounter Eastern European fine hospitality at the Courtyard Warsaw Airport. Convenience abounds at our stylish hotel; walk to and from your plane at Warsaw Chopin Airport or visit the city center with ease. Relax in spacious rooms or suites, rooms with airport views and handicap-accessible rooms, each enhanced by deluxe amenities and complimentary Wi-Fi. Plush pillowtop bedding and soundproof windows enable a peaceful night's rest. Other in-room perks include a flat-screen TV with satellite and room service. Hosts find our elegant event venues irresistible, as well as customizable menus, catering and event planning; couples hosting a wedding in our hotel receive free flight tickets and more. Dine on Polish or international cuisine at Brasserie Restaurant; sip coffee or cocktails in our Lobby Bar. Stay fit during your visit at our 24-hour fitness center. From start to finish, we reward our guests with four-star service and a memorable hotel experience here in Warsaw, Poland.Marriott

name: Sheraton Grand Warsaw
description: Sheraton Grand Warsaw, a distinguished 5-star hotel catering to both leisure and business travelers, offers sophisticated elegance. Hotel's prominent position in the city center provides easy access to famous bars, attractive cafés, high-end shopping, and historical attractions. Guests can expect the highest level of comfort in our 350 modern rooms and suites. Contemporary meeting facilities are outfitted with the latest technology and backed up by an experienced team, assuring the success of every event. The hotel features two great restaurants: Cucina Mia, serving authentic Italian cuisine, and inAzia, known for its exquisite dishes. In the recently refurbished Sheraton Fitness you'll discover sophisticated Technogym equipment for your personalized exercise experience. Enjoy the time to unwind in our saunas and steam rooms. Sheraton Grand Warsaw promotes sustainability with 0 food waste and innovative energy usage. Green Key accreditation shows its dedication to eco-friendly hospitality.Marriott

name: Warsaw Marriott Hotel
description: Discover an upscale city center hotel with warm service and 5-star amenities when you visit Warsaw Marriott Hotel. Spacious hotel rooms await, featuring plush bedding, flat-screen TVs and stunning views of Warsaw. For those looking for extra space, our suites will add another layer of splendor to your trip, offering separate living, dining and sleeping areas, as well as access to the M Club. For relaxation, guests can unwind at our gym and indoor pool, whirlpool or dry sauna. Culinary experience will be lifted up by dining and drinking at one of our hotel's several restaurants, including Panorama Sky Bar and Floor No2 restaurant. Host a meeting or special event in Warsaw at one of our 25 versatile meeting, conference and wedding venues and take advantage of our delicious catering and expert planning services to ensure an 5-star occasion. Additional services include 24-hour room service, on-site parking, valet dry-cleaning and florist.Marriott

name: H15 Boutique Hotel
description: The 5-star, H15 Boutique Hotel is a part of an impressive, historic building in the centre of Warsaw where in the pre-war times the Soviet embassy was located. It's been awarded by Michelin and Forbes in 2018. It offers accommodation in stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and a coffee maker. A conference room is also available. Each apartment is air-conditioned, with modern interiors and a seating area. Guests can relax in front of a LED TV with satellite channels. Some apartments feature a balcony and all have a safety deposit box. There is a kitchenette with a Nespresso coffee maker and free Fair Trade coffee. The bathroom is finished with stone elements and offers free toiletries. Recommended by Michelin Guide, the Signature Restaurant offers international cuisine. A drink or two can be enjoyed in the bar. H15 Boutique Hotel is situated only 200 metres from numerous restaurants and pubs. Metro Centrum Station is 750 metres away and the Central Train Station is 950 metres away.

name: Intercontinental Warsaw, An IHG Hotel
description: InterContinental Warsaw is one of Warsaw's well-known landmarks. Its city centre location allows quick access to attractions like Warsaw Old Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Voted Poland's Leading Hotel in 2022, it has more than 1340 sqm of superb conference space, including a ballroom and the private 41st-floor Club Lounge. Delight yourself in sophisticated Polish cuisine in our Platter restaurant. Relax in the 43rd-floor pool and enjoy a spectacular view from our stylish rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Teatro Hotel
description: 4-star, boutique Teatro Hotel is located in the historic house on famous Royal Route of Warsaw, right by Nowy Świat-Uniwersytet Metro Station. It welcomes guests with Teatro Hotel restaurant and a wine bar. Free WiFi is available. Each elegant, air-conditioned room comes with a flat-screen TV with a variety of satellite channels. You will find a coffee machine and a minibar with complimentary mineral water in the room. A private bathroom comes with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Some rooms come with a modern fireplace You will find a hairdresser's at the property. Guests can order a'la carte breakfasts daily, and 24-hour reception provides concierge services. Krakowskie Przedmieście Street is 200 metres from Teatro Hotel and it is 1 km to the Old Town. Warsaw Chopin Airport is 10 km away.

name: Hotel Indigo Warsaw - Nowy Swiat
description: Introducing something old and something new to the heart of Warsaw's trendy Nowy Swiat district, welcome to the Hotel Indigo® Warsaw – Nowy Swiat. Our boutique hotel mixes chic contemporary design with historic architecture. Guest rooms offer city views, free WiFi and air-conditioning, and some have balconies. We are steps from Nowy Swiat street and a short walk from the enchanting Old Town. You can discover fascinating art across the road at the National Museum, and walk to performances at the towering Palace of Culture and Science. Muzeum Narodowe 06 metro station is moments away. Wind down in our steam room, enjoy inventive Polish cuisine with a modern approach in FLO restaurant.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sofitel Warsaw Victoria
description: The elegant interiors at the Sofitel Warsaw Victoria hotel were designed by French architect Didier Gomez. Located in the heart of Warsaw, close to the Old Town, Royal Castle and Polish National Opera, the hotel is ideal for both business and leisure trav elers. Enjoy a wonderful trip in this unique luxury hotel. Make your business meetings inspirational thanks to our renovated meeting rooms and the experience of our MagnifiqueMeetings Concierge.accorhotels.com

name: Puro Warszawa Centrum
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Warsaw, PURO Warszawa Centrum offers air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a garden, as well as a sauna. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. PURO Warszawa Centrum offers a terrace. Speaking German, English, Polish and Russian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include National Museum in Warsaw, Polish Army Museum and Warsaw Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 7 km from PURO Warszawa Centrum.

name: Polonia Palace Hotel
description: The Polonia Palace Hotel welcomes you to Warsaw, Poland. We are pleased to offer you the chance to stay at a truly unique hotel in the center of the capital. Boasting an enviable location opposite the Palace of Culture and Science, the Polonia Palace is a delightful mix of long Polish hospitality tradition with eternal elegance. Here, the tourist just as well as the business traveller will find relaxation and up-to-date business facilities in 206 elegant rooms and suites.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton Warsaw City
description: The Hilton Warsaw City brings a unique style of contemporary living to downtown Warsaw and offers impressive city views. Relax in one of our 314 modern guest rooms and suites, all featuring the latest technology. WiFi is available in every guest and meeting room, usage fees apply. Savor modern Polish and European cuisine in Meza Restaurant or unwind in the Pistaccio Lobby Bar & Lounge and enjoy a light snack or coffee at this Warsaw hotel. We offer the largest conference room in the centre of Warsaw. Do business in the Warsaw Hall or choose one of 12 multi-functional meeting rooms. Work in our business centre and impress clients in our boardroom. Workout in Holmes Place Premium Club & Spa or swim laps of the indoor pool. Children aged 4-16 are welcome at the pool on weekends between 1pm - 4pm when accompanied by an adult. The hotel is located 20-30 minutes from the airport, in the central business and financial area of Warsaw. Explore the Old Town, Warsaw's UNESCO World Heritage monument which is a 25-minute walk from the hotel.Hilton

name: Radisson Collection Hotel, Warsaw
description: Offering a swimming pool, Radisson Collection Hotel, Warsaw is just a 10-minute walk from Warsaw Central Station. Air conditioned rooms with tea and coffee facilities are available. Free WiFi is provided. The spacious and modern rooms at the Radisson Collection come with a safety deposit box and a large work desk. All have a large, modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Radisson Collection Hotel, Warsaw houses the TAGO Restaurant where breakfast buffet is served, and THE SPOT Restaurant and Bar. It's an all-seasons restaurant offering modern cuisine and stylish cocktails. During the summer guests can dine and relax on an outdoor terrace. The hotel is situated just a 10-minute walk from Złote Tarasy Shopping Centre and the Palace of Culture & Science. Warsaw Chopin Airport is just a 20-minute drive away.

name: Novotel Warszawa Centrum
description: Book a room at the 4-star Novotel Warszawa Centrum with stunning views of the vibrant city of Warsaw. The hotel is located 5 minutes' walk from the Central Train Station, with historic sites, monuments, shops and cultural institutions close by for great sightseeing. Find relaxation away from the hustle and bustle of the city as well as exquisite cuisine in the hotel's modern bar and restaurant. At Novotel, we offer a fully equipped conference center and make sure every business meeting is a success.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Warszawa Ursus Station
description: First modern facility in western part of Warsaw. Its décor refers to history of first Polish electric railway. It consists of 5 floors, 214 rooms, including 80 with kitchenette and 15 suites, well-equipped fitness area with sauna, restaurant and garage. For comfort and safety and due to proximity of railway tracks and streets, the hotel is equipped with highest degree not opening soundproofing windows.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Warszawa Grand
description: Four-star Mercure Warszawa Grand hotel is located in very center of city right on main streets of Warsaw and near Old Town. Its advantage is its prestigious location surrounded by ministries and embassies, among best fashion houses and restaurants. Comfortable rooms with professional service and excellent cuisine are ideal place for business travellers and those who spend their free time in capital.accorhotels.com

name: Vienna House Mokotow Warsaw
description: Situated in Warsaw, 7 km from Frideric Chopin's Monument, Vienna House by Wyndham Mokotow Warsaw features accommodation with a fitness centre and a terrace. In a prime location in the Mokotów district, this hotel provides a bar. Free WiFi is included. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms at Vienna House by Wyndham Mokotow Warsaw have air conditioning and a desk. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Speaking English and Polish at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Chancellery of Prime Minister of Poland is 7 km from Vienna House by Wyndham Mokotow Warsaw, while Royal Łazienki Park is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frédéric Chopin Airport, 3.3 km from the property. Mokotów is a great choice for people who are interested in convenient public transport connections to the center of Warsaw.

name: Golden Tulip Warsaw Airport
description: Set in Warsaw, 5.1 km from Warsaw West Train Station, Golden Tulip Warsaw Airport offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel features a sauna and luggage storage space. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available every morning at the property. Blue City is 5.4 km from the hotel, while Warsaw Central Railway Station is 6.1 km away. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 1 km from Golden Tulip Warsaw Airport.

name: Airport Hotel Okęcie
description: Located just 1 km from the Warsaw Chopin Airport, Hotel Airport Okęcie offers free airport shuttle and free Wi-Fi in the entire building. All air-conditioned rooms and apartments at the Hotel Airport Okęcie are fitted with tea/coffee facilities and satellite TV with pay channels. Guests can benefit from a minibar. Each unit's modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel offers its guests a wide gastronomic offer by award-winning chefs; including Polish and international dishes as well as varied breakfasts. The hotel's Chocolate Café serves a variety of desserts, chocolates, drinks and snacks. At additional charge, all guests of the Hotel Airport Okęcie have access to the hotel’s wellness centre, which features a steam sauna, a mud bath and a sensation shower. Free access to the on-site gym is provided. The hotel also offers a bicycle rental. Warsaw Central Railway Station and the Palace of Culture and Science are about 6 km away from the hotel.

name: Hotel Lord Warsaw Airport
description: Located 4 km from Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 4-star Hotel Lord offers a variety of spa, wellness and dining facilities. Its air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a free internet connection. The rooms at the Lord are spacious and feature traditional interior design. Private bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer. Upon request, rooms with tea and coffee making set can be assigned. Hotel Lord has a restaurant that serves Polish and international dishes. It is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Lord Club offers drinks and billiards is also available on site. Warsaw’s City centre is a 8 minute drive away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Conference Centre Warsaw
description: Set in charming landscaped gardens, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Conference Centre Warsaw offers a relaxing retreat in Warsaw, just 20 minutes from the city center and 25 minutes from Warsaw Chopin Airport. Discover modern amenities and warm, attentive service all starting with our signature DoubleTree cookie at check-in. From inviting guest rooms to elegant suites and dedicated spa rooms, this Warsaw hotel offers a choice of accommodations, all boasting complimentary WiFi and comfortable furnishings. Select an executive level room and enjoy complimentary access to the Executive Lounge and stunning views of our grounds with a pond and century-old trees. Unwind and revive at the hotel's spa, offering a range of medical and traditional treatments. Reinvigorate with a workout in the fitness center or take a dip in the salty indoor pool overlooking the park. Sip cocktails in the Alchemy Lounge Bar or Lobby Bar before enjoying a delicious dinner in our park-side restaurant, also open for lunch and dinner. Children can meet new friends at our dedicated learning center. Boasting 59,000 sq.ft. of flexible meeting and event space, this hotel in Warsaw is capable of hosting events for up to 2,000 guests. Whether you imagine an outdoor summer wedding in our gazebo, a large conference in the Universe Ballroom, or an intimate boardroom meeting, enlist the expert services of our professional team members to help plan the details, ensuring your event is a success.Hilton

name: Crowne Plaza Warsaw - The Hub
description: Crowne Plaza Warsaw -The HUB is located in the heart of the most dynamically developing business area in the city centre. The hotel has 212 elegant rooms and suites with plush furnishings and a modern design.The onsite Studio Lounge also offers Club guests, a flexible space to work or relax. Direct access to the underground station provides excellent and easy transport to some of the city’s most important spots. From intimate boardrooms to a spectacular ballroom, the modern conference centre can accommodate 700 people and offers 30 meeting rooms which can be used for individual meetings or break out sessions. With Warsaw Chopin Airport just a 15-minute drive away, and the closest underground station, Rondo Daszynskiego, only a one minute walk, this four star hotel offers great stay options for business travellers or tourists to the city. Guests will also have access to two onsite restaurants with menus curated by Executive Chef Paweł Suchenek and a top floor cocktail bar,overlooking the city’s panorama and with an outside terrace. The Signature Bar is in the lobby area and is an all-day dining restaurant featuring a sustainably sourced menu with local produce, including a substantial breakfast and lunch menu, plus healthy snacks. The hotel’s restaurant Nova Wola offers a modern take on traditional Polish food using high quality ingredients sourced from Polish suppliers and foraged in the wild, with the aim of taking centre stage in Warsaw’s premium casual diningIHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Novotel Warszawa Airport
description: Novotel Warszawa Airport is located in Warsaw Wlochy, at intersection of 1 Sierpnia and Zwirki i Wigury streets, on main road connecting Okecie Airport with center of Warsaw. Location outside the center allows to avoid traffic jams and lack of parking spaces. Distance from central station is only 5 km, and from Chopin airport, to which you will be transported free of charge 2 km.accorhotels.com

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Warsaw
description: Leonardo Royal Hotel Warsaw is located in the centre of Warsaw, only 500 metres from Warsaw Uprising Museum and 1.6 km from the Central Railway Station. It offers elegant rooms and suites with free WiFi and a view of the city. Each air-conditioned room includes a private bathroom with bath or shower, as well as a flat-screen TV and a mini-fridge. Extras include a desk and some units offer a kitchenette. The hotel includes a restaurant, serving international cuisine and a breakfast buffet. There is also bar. Leonardo Royal Hotel has a 24-hour front desk service. There are also 6 conference rooms, available at surcharge. There is a bicycle rental spot right outside the building. On request, paid private parking is available nearby. Leonardo Royal Hotel Warsaw is situated 1.3 km from the Palace of Culture and Science. The Złote Tarasy Shopping Mall is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Mercure Warszawa Centrum
description: The Mercure Warszawa Centrum Hotel is located in the city center, next to the Zlote Tarasy, the largest shopping center in Warsaw, and not far from the commercial buildings: Warsaw Financial Center, Warsaw Towers, and Rondo ONZ 1. Its location in the rapidly developing business heart of the city, and its proximity to the exhibition center (Palace of Culture and Science) and a number of cultural attractions makes hotel the perfect location for both business travelers and tourists.accorhotels.com

name: Regent Warsaw Hotel
description: Regent Warsaw Hotel, a luxurious business hotel set on the lovely tree-lined Belwederska Boulevard in the citys elegant diplomatic district and only steps away from the astoundingly beautiful Royal Gardens of azienki Park. The hotel is ideally situated close to the business centers, as well as on direct route to Warsaws old town, fashionable shops of Nowy wiat, theatres and museums. It is also easily accessible from the Fryderyk Chopin airport.iHotelier/iStay

name: V Hotel Warsaw
description: V Hotel Warsaw features a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Warsaw. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The units at V Hotel Warsaw feature air conditioning and a desk. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. V Hotel Warsaw also provides a business centre and guests can check the newspapers or use the fax machine and photocopier at the hotel. Legia Warsaw Stadium is 4.1 km from V Hotel Warsaw, while Warsaw National Stadium is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Warszawa
description: Hotel Warszawa is a 5-star hotel offering a fitness center, spa and wellness center along with free WIFI. It is situated 700 metres from Parade Square and Holy Cross Church. Providing their guests with a 24-hour front desk, this property also has a sun terrace and a restaurant that serves local cuisine. The rooms in Hotel Warszawa come equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Certain rooms offer a terrace, while all units feature a wardrobe. In this property the guests are served a continental breakfast. They also have an access to a bar. The guests are provided with an access to spa and wellness facilities including a sauna and an indoor pool during their stay at the property. Bike hire and car hire are also available at this accommodation. The area is popular for cycling. Hotel Warszawa is located 800 metres from Palace of Culture & Science, while Zacheta National Art Gallery is less than 1 km away. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Bellotto
description: Located in the 16th century Bishops Palace in the vicinity of the Old Town of Warsaw, 200 metres from Royal Castle, Hotel Bellotto features air-conditioned rooms and private parking. There is a casino on site and guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar. Every classically furnished room has a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience.Hotel Bellotto features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. There is also a sauna and a steam room as well as a fitness area and a massage room. Sigismund's Column is 200 metres from Hotel Bellotto, while Grand Theatre - Polish National Opera is 300 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Warsaw Chopin Airport, 9 km from Hotel Bellotto.

name: Exclusive Aparthotel
address: ul. Bagno 2, Klatka D, 00-112 Warsaw, Mazowieckie
description: Located in the heart of Warsaw, by the Palace of Culture and Science, yet in a quiet area, EXCLUSIVE Aparthotel offers a 24-hour reception and modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Metro station Świętokrzyska is just 200 metres away. The apartments are elegant. Each comes with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with a shower. There is a washing machine and ironing facilities. A kitchenette at EXCLUSIVE Aparthotel is equipped with a stove, a refrigerator and a dishwasher. A dining area is also offered. Breakfasts can be delivered to the apartments. Warszawa Centralna Train Station is 1 km away and the beautiful Old Town is about 2 km away.

name: Golden Tulip Warsaw Centre
description: Located just a 4-minute drive from the Expo XXI International Expo Centre, and a 15 minutes’ walk from the Warsaw Central Railway Station, Golden Tulip Warsaw Centre offers elegant air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. In the morning a varied breakfast buffet is served at this 4-star hotel. The spacious and modern rooms at the Golden Tulip come with a tea and coffee maker and mineral water. In each there is a fridge and an electric kettle. The bathroom comes with a bathtub or shower. All feature a TV with satellite channels. Guests of the hotel have free access to the hotel’s sauna and a fitness room. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange transportation or laundry services. The Golden Tulip’s restaurant, Tulipe, serves international cuisine, including vegetarian options and regional dishes, prepared with local produce. Golden Tulip Warsaw Centre is situated about 5 minutes’ walk from the Warsaw Uprising Museum. The historic Warsaw Old Town is 3 km away. The property is 7.2 km from the Copernicus Science Centre, 10.9 km from Wilanów, 1.4 km from Złote Tarasy Shopping Centre and 7.2 km from the National Stadium.

name: Hotel Splendor
address: ul. Warszawska 197E, Stare Babice, 05-082 Warsaw, Mazowieckie
description: Splendor is a 4-star, elegant hotel situated in a peaceful vicinity of the Kampinos National Park and the local cycling path. It offers free WiFi in all areas and a free private parking on site. All rooms are stylishly designed and feature a TV. Each boasts a modern bathroom with a shower or a bathtub. The rooms come with a complimentary bottle of water, as well as a tea and coffee maker. Guests at Splendor can relax in the garden and on the property’s terrace or rent sports equipment on site. The front desk staff is at guests’ disposal 24 hours a day. The Splendor restaurant specialises in Polish and international dishes prepared with ecological ingredients from the local producers. At the hotel’s bar guests can enjoy original drinks and beverages from all over the world. The property is locates 12 km from the centre of Warsaw. Wola Park shoppinh Centre is 6 km away.

name: Barceló Warsaw Powisle
description: No description found

name: Mamaison Hotel Le Regina Warsaw
description: Mamaison Hotel Le Regina Warsaw is a 5-star establishment that offers accommodation in the beautiful Warsaw’s Old Town. POLIN Museum of the History of Polish Jews is 1.2 km away and the Multimedia Fountain Park and newly built boulevards along the Vistula River are is just 250 metres from the hotel. Mamaison Hotel Le Regina Warsaw is housed in a historic building. All rooms are elegantly furnished and include flat-screen satellite TVs. Some rooms offer views of the interior courtyard or of Warsaw. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. The Royal Route is just 950 m from the Le Regina. Such landmarks can be found there as The Presidential Palace and the main campus of The University of Warsaw. Mamaison Hotel Le Regina Warsaw also offers a spa and wellness centre that includes an indoor swimming pool. The National Stadium which hosts various sports and entertainment events is 3.7 km away.

name: Nyx Hotel Warsaw By Leonardo Hotels
description: NYX Hotel Warsaw by Leonardo Hotels features a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Warsaw. This 4-star hotel offers an ATM and a business centre. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At NYX Hotel Warsaw by Leonardo Hotels each room includes bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. You can play billiards at the accommodation, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near NYX Hotel Warsaw by Leonardo Hotels include Warsaw Central Railway Station, Złote Tarasy Shopping Centre and Palace of Culture and Science. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Warsaw Plaza Hotel
description: Warsaw Plaza Hotel is a 4-star hotel located in Warsaw. Free WiFi access is available, as well as underground, guarded parking. Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a seating area. Complete with a fridge the rooms also come with an electric kettle. Featuring a bath or shower, bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. There is an elegant Moments restaurant serving international dishes, as well as One & Only Bar where guests can relax with a drink. At Warsaw Plaza Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include extensive meeting facilities and luggage storage. The hotel is 10 km from the city centre. Warsaw Chopin Airport is 4 km away.

name: Arche Hotel Krakowska
description: Set in the capital's business district, 4 km from the airport at Krakowska Avenue, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a restaurant, conference rooms and a fitness room. The rooms come with a desk. Each room is fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms have a kitchenette. At Arche Hotel Krakowska the rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

name: Jess Hotel & Spa Warsaw Old Town
description: Jess Hotel & Spa Warsaw Old Town is well situated in Warsaw, and offers a bar and free WiFi. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Jess Hotel & Spa Warsaw Old Town every room includes bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available every morning at the property. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a hammam and hot spring bath. Popular points of interest near Jess Hotel & Spa Warsaw Old Town include Grand Theatre - Polish National Opera, Sigismund's Column and Castle Square. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Mercure Wiazowna Brant
description: Mercure Wiazowna Brant is a modern, luxurious hotel located on the outskirts of eastern parts of Warsaw. The city centre is a 20-minute drive away and Trade Fair and Congress Centre MT Polska is a 10-minute away. It offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Conferencing and banqueting facilities are provided. The rooms are elegantly decorated and air-conditioned. Each comes with a flat-screen TV, a telephone with voice messaging, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The bathroom has a hairdryer. There is a children’s playroom and a spacious barbecuing gazebo in the garden. Guests can benefit from a sauna and a free private parking with CCTV surveillance. The elegant restaurant in its menu combines traditional Polish cuisine with the new culinary trends. There also is a club with a bar offering a wide selection of drinks.
